steps.name: Landing Page
steps.text: Let’s start with your homepage. This will be the center of your site.

steps.name: Product Editor Page
steps.text:
This is the Product Editor Page.
This page will enable you to edit products.
Enter in the product SKU or UPC to edit.

steps.name: Custom Pages
steps.text:
In this page you can modify the navigation bar that shows up on your homepage.

Click here to modify.

steps.name: Landing Page
steps.text:
This page will show you how your homepage is viewed.

Customize different features on here.

steps.name: About Us
steps.text:
This page lets you customize your about us section.
Make your page as personable as you’d like!
